sections.heading: Summary
sections.content:
Renewable Transport Fuel Obligation statistics: data tables. Data on the supply of renewable fuel, as required under the Renewable Transport Fuel Obligation (RTFO).

Mirror, signal, manoeuvres: Military driving examiners mobilised to cut test backlog. Partnership with the Ministry of Defence will see 36 defence driving examiners provide thousands of additional tests over the next year.

Policy paper: Memorandum of Understanding between the AAIB and the Royal Gibraltar Police. Memorandum of Understanding between the Air Accidents Investigation Branch and the Royal Gibraltar Police

sections.heading: Context
sections.content: Transport and infrastructure decisions shape how passengers and freight reach Scottish and UK airports. For historical context on aviation infrastructure and industrial development, see the linked research volumes.
